summary: "The Lord of the Rings" (1978) is an animated fantasy movie directed by Ralph Bakshi, based on J.R.R. Tolkien's novel. It tells the story of a group of different races, including Hobbits, Humans, an Elf, a Dwarf, and a wizard, who join forces to destroy a powerful ring created by the evil Sauron. Bakshi used a unique animation style called rotoscoping, tracing over live-action footage. Despite mixed reviews, the film was a hit and inspired future adaptations, including Peter Jackson's trilogy.
title: The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)
